resources.string: Stocat cu criptare cu acces zero

Acest mesaj este stocat în contul personal cu criptare cu acces zero. Nici Proton, nici altcineva nu îl poate citi.\n\nTotuși, un expeditor sau un destinatar care nu utilizează Proton Mail poate avea o copie necriptată stocată pe serverul său de e-mail.
Mesaj criptat bilateral
Ca toate mesajele, este stocat pe serverele Proton utilizând criptare cu acces zero.
Proton criptat bilateral de la expeditor verificat
Acest mesaj este protejat cu criptare bilaterală automată de la Proton și expeditorul declarat a fost verificat.
Criptat bilateral de la Proton cu verificare eșuată
Acest mesaj este protejat prin criptare bilaterală automată de la Proton. Totuși, verificarea expeditorului a eșuat.\nConfirmați autenticitatea mesajului cu persoana de contact.
Criptat bilateral cu PGP

Acest mesaj este protejat cu criptare bilaterală prin PGP. Este criptat pe dispozitivul expeditorului și poate fi decriptat doar de către destinatar.\n\nCa toate mesajele, este stocat pe serverele Proton utilizând criptare cu acces zero.
Criptat bilateral și semnat cu PGP

This message is protected with PGP end-to-end encryption. It is encrypted on the sender\'s device and can only be decrypted by the recipient. \n\nAdditionally, the signature proves to the recipient that your message is genuine and hasn\'t been tampered with.
PGP end-to-end encrypted from verified contact

This message is protected with PGP end‑to‑end encryption. It is encrypted on the sender’s device and can only be decrypted by the recipient. \n\nAdditionally, we verified the message was sent by the stated sender.
PGP end-to-end encrypted with failed verification

This message is protected with PGP end‑to‑end encryption. It is encrypted on the sender’s device and can only be decrypted by the recipient. \n\nHowever, the sender verification failed. Please confirm the authenticity of the message with your contact.
PGP signed message

This message was not sent with end-to-end encryption, but is stored on Proton servers using zero-access encryption. \n\nYou have also digitally signed it, proving to the recipient that your message is genuine and hasn\'t been tampered with.
PGP-signed message from verified contact
This message was not sent with end-to-end-encryption, but is stored on Proton servers using zero-access-encryption. \n\nWe also verified that the message was sent by the stated sender.
PGP-signed message with failed verification

This message was not sent with end-to-end-encryption, but is stored on Proton servers using zero-access-encryption. \n\nHowever, the sender verification failed. Please confirm the authenticity of the message with your contact.
Show details
